title: Simple ToDo App
description: A task management app that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks.
objective: Improve productivity by organizing daily tasks efficiently.
features: Add, edit, and delete tasks
Mark tasks as completed
Persistent task storage with local storage

title: NxtTrendz E-commerce App
description: This e-commerce app is designed to provide users with a seamless and intuitive online shopping experience. It incorporates a range of essential features, ensuring convenience and personalization for all types of users.
objective: Provide users with a seamless shopping experience similar to Amazon or Flipkart.
features: Secure login for all users, with special perks for Prime members like faster delivery and exclusive offers.
Quickly find products by name or category
Narrow down choices by price, brand, ratings, and more.
Select items, review them, and manage your shopping cart easily.
Multiple secure payment options for a smooth checkout experience

title: Movie Database App
description: A movie discovery app featuring pagination for browsing popular, top-rated, and upcoming movies.
objective: Help users discover movies using TheMovieDB API.
features: Search functionality for movies by name
Category-wise listings: Popular, Top Rated, Upcoming
Pagination with Next/Previous buttons
Movie detail page with title, rating, description, and poster
Responsive design for all devices
Integration with TheMovieDB API
Loading indicators and error handling

title: Jobby App
description: A job search platform that allows users to filter and apply for jobs based on various criteria.
objective: Allow job seekers to find relevant jobs easily.
features: Login form with Error handling
Job listings with: Company logo, Job role, location, employment type, Salary and ratings
Search and filter jobs by employment , salary range and Search Input
Job details page with: Job Skills, Life at Company, Description and Apply Now link
Implementation of protected routes

title: Library Management System
description: A system to manage book inventory, user borrowing, and returns.
objective: Digitize library operations for ease of management.
features: Search input field triggered on Enter key press
Fetch and parse book data using fetch()
Spinner displayed while loading
Dynamically creates and appends DOM elements (image, author)
Graceful handling of no results

title: Speed Typing Test
description: A web app that measures typing speed and accuracy in real-time.
features: Live words per minute (WPM) counter
Accuracy measurement
Restart functionality

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: A command-line Python game that lets users play Rock Paper Scissors against the computer.
objective: Fun mini-game to demonstrate simple logic in Python.
features: Random computer choice
User vs Computer rounds
Win/loss/draw logic

title: Nxt Watch
description: A smart video app showcasing trending content for endless entertainment and creativity.
objective: Create a YouTube-like experience with theme support.
features: Authentication with login functionality
Dark and light theme toggle
Home, Trending, Gaming, and Saved Videos routes
Search functionality for videos
Video details page with video player and channel info
Save videos to a personal watchlist
Error handling for failed API calls
Responsive design across all devices

title: Daily Mood Tracker
description: An app designed to help users monitor and reflect on their daily moods for mental well-being.
objective: Provide an intuitive, visual representation of mood patterns.
features: Daily mood logging with emojis or mood labels
Add notes or journal entries with each mood
View mood history with date-wise filtering
Mood trends visualization using charts
Edit or delete past mood entries
Local storage to retain data between sessions
Clean and calming user interface

title: Restaurant app
description: An app to explore dishes by category, customize them, add to cart, and manage orders effortlessly.
objective: Simplify food discovery and ordering with customizable options and efficient cart management.
features: Login authentication using js-cookie
Add to cart and manage cart items
Adjust quantity or remove items from cart
Route navigation between Home, Cart, and Login pages
React Context used for global cart state management
Responsive UI with clean design
Secure routing and redirection for unauthenticated users
Customization button available

title: Food Munch App
description: A modern food ordering website with elegant UI, interactive menu sections, and responsive design built using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
objective: To provide users a seamless experience for exploring food menus, understanding services, and encouraging engagement through visually appealing sections.
features: Landing page with banner and call-to-action
Why Choose Us section showcasing service highlights
Explore Menu with categorized food items
Responsive grid layout using Bootstrap
Delivery and Payment information with visuals
Social media follow links with branded icons
Fixed-top navbar with smooth scrolling
Mobile-friendly design with collapsible navbar
